channel.title: Help for project will receive credits if you can tell me how
channel.description: so im working on this project and i wanna add some walls and such in different places. i got a 317 pi server im wanting to know how do i add them client side, as in how would i add a wall in the game because i can make custom objects like stools and chairs and all but when it comes to a wall im stuck i dont know where to start. i already have been searching all over just cant find it. well thanks please help. will rep

item.title: Help for project will receive credits if you can tell me how
item.dc:creator: @hadlich4 hadlich4
item.description:
@hadlich4 wrote:

[quote=“kyler887, post:2, topic:509704”]Search for the objectmanager.java file. it’s the server side one.

you should see a bunch of code lined up like this
c.getPA().checkObjectSpawn(4706, 3103, 3164, 1, 10);
item id ^ ^ coordinates 1 you can change to 1,0,-1,2, for the direction it faces and idk wtf 10 means dont mess with it

                                         [/quote]

I need client side i already know this, thankyou for trying though.

Read full topic
item.source: Help for project will receive credits if you can tell me how
